author: fwyzard
body:
Set the thread stack size even if the number of threads is not specified on the command line nor in the `process.options` ParameterSet.

Rewrite the logic handling the number of threads and the thread stack size: now the two parameters should be handle correctly even if one is set on the command line and the other is set in the python configuration.
title: Always set the thread stack size when configuring TBB, even if the number of threads is not specified (10.3.x)
